title: True Love Experiment: A Complicated Streamer Takes His Shot
alternative_title: Kenshou Kojirase Haishinsha ga Gachikoi Shitemita ; Kojirase Haishinsha ga Gachikoi ; True Love Experiment: A Complicated Streamer Takes His Shot! ; 拗らせ配信者がガチ恋してみた! ; 自卑创作者踏出恋爱第一步!~一被触碰就有感觉的他~ ; 自卑創作者踏出戀愛第一步!~一被觸碰就有感覺的他~
status: Kenshou Kojirase Haishinsha ga Gachikoi Shitemita ; Kojirase Haishinsha ga Gachikoi ; True Love Experiment: A Complicated Streamer Takes His Shot! ; 拗らせ配信者がガチ恋してみた! ; 自卑创作者踏出恋爱第一步!~一被触碰就有感觉的他~ ; 自卑創作者踏出戀愛第一步!~一被觸碰就有感覺的他~
description:
Description :
        From Renta: Hibari, a member of the streaming group Bird's Nest TV, has a secret he can't tell anybody...
He has a super sensitive body that makes him feel uncomfortable when people touch him. Ever insecure about it, he can't even bring himself to approach Kodai, his crush. Then, one day while shooting a video, Kodai and another member, Masato, get too close, too fast...!
With the emergence of such an unexpected rival, Hibari falls into a depressive state uncharacteristic of him...
